title: RestEasy Reactive sendFile has undefined semantics
body:
### Describe the bug

https://github.com/stuartwdouglas/quarkus/blob/fe1f9554fd2c49462acaf4a78e2d809a6bc22a82/independent-projects/resteasy-reactive/server/vertx/src/main/java/org/jboss/resteasy/reactive/server/vertx/VertxResteasyReactiveRequestContext.java#L451

This method ignores the Future returned by the vert.x sendFile method, so the client has no way of knowing to close the response when it is done. 


### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_
